TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kakawit, title = Kakawit, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kakawit} }

S.FORM: Takaray a sowal O kakawit hananay i, o mamangay a kawkaw, o kamit hananay ko roma a pangangan, o sapipanay a po'ot, itini i sawalian a niyaro' o minik hananay ko kamit. ona kakawit hananay a sowal i, ira ho ko roma a imi nona tilid, o sapikawit to kakawiten a dafong.
